name: Balance (itch) (JACK2D)
description:
BALANCE:

A Game with Two different Worlds in which both Players have to collect Resources to Survive.

There is only one way to win: by finding BALANCE

It happens when both players get the same amount of resources

I hope you enjoy it, I'm 12 and a half, learning to code with passion and sweat from Tenerife.

Done from scratches in 15hrs!
